member.name: T:Drelanium.BDD.BaseBindingClass
member.summary:
BaseClass for StepDefinition and Hooks SpecFlow classes.
Apply on the inherited classes to make it visible for SpecFlow.
Use | | method attributes for StepDefinition non-static methods.
Use | method attributes to implement TestRun SetUp and TearDown static methods.
Use | method attributes to implement Feature SetUp and TearDown static methods.
Use | method attributes to implement Scenario SetUp and TearDown non-static methods.
Use | method attributes to implement ScenarioBlock SetUp and TearDown non-static methods.
Use | method attributes to implement Step SetUp and TearDown non-static methods.

member.name: M:Drelanium.BDD.BaseBindingClass.#ctor(TechTalk.SpecFlow.TestThreadContext,TechTalk.SpecFlow.FeatureContext,TechTalk.SpecFlow.ScenarioContext)
member.param: Context object, that can be used during the usage of the TestThread.
Context object, that can be used during the execution of the Feature.
Context object, that can be used during the execution of the Scenario.
